粘.definition: to glue; to paste; to adhere; to stick to

粘皮著骨.definition: see 粘皮帶骨|粘皮带骨[nian2pi2-dai4gu3]

粘聚.definition: to cohere; to group together as a unit; to agglomerate

粘蟲.definition: army worm (e.g. Mythimna separata or Leucania separata etc, major cereal pests)

粘貼.definition: to stick; to affix; to adhere; to paste (as in "copy and paste"); Taiwan pr. [nian2 tie1]; also written 黏貼|黏贴[nian2 tie1]

粘連.definition: adhesion; to adhere; to cohere; to stick
